article_title: Final rule on mental health and addiction parity act is expected Friday

article_metadata.description: A much-awaited final rule to implement the 2008 Paul Wellstone and Pete Domenici Mental Health Parity and Addiction Equity Act is likely to come on Friday, U.S. Rep. Patrick Kennedy said during testimony today before a Senate subcommittee hearing.

og.description: Since 2008, “interim” federal rules and regulations have left the parity law open to interpretation.
og.title: Final rule on mental health and addiction parity act is expected Friday
